entry.title: Monday: Rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning then rain. Rain mixed with wet snow late this morning. Snow level rising to 1000 metres this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023
